alert.note: Alert for Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 10:04PM MDT until June 12 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1104 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles north of Vivian, or 14 miles northwest of Presho, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Cedar Creek Rec Area. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
